Sea of Clouds.requires: ({Character_Mode('Sea of Clouds')} AND (|Kirby| AND |@Princess|)) OR {Stage_Mode('Sea of Clouds')}

The Jungle.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Jungle')} AND (|Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Jungle')}

The Lake.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Lake')} AND (|Diddy Kong| and |Fox|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Lake')}

The Ruined Zoo.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Ruined Zoo')} AND |Lucas|) OR {Stage_Mode('The Ruined Zoo')}

The Battlefield Fortress.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Battlefield Fortress')} AND |Marth|) OR {Stage_Mode('The Battlefield Fortress')}

The Research Facility I.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Research Facility I')} AND {Check_Facility_1_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('The Research Facility I')}

The Lake Shore.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Lake Shore')} AND (|Link| AND |Yoshi|) OR (|Mario| AND |Pit|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Lake Shore')}

The Path to the Ruins.requires: ({Character_Mode(Stage_Mode('The Path to the Ruins')} AND {Check_Ruins_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('The Path to the Ruins')}

The Cave.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Cave')} AND (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Cave')}

The Wilds I.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Wilds I')} AND (|Marth| AND |Meta Knight| AND |Ike|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Wilds I')}

The Ruined Hall.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Ruined Hall')} AND {Check_Ruins_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('The Ruined Hall')}

The Wilds II.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Wilds II')} AND (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Wilds II')}

The Swamp.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Swamp')} AND (|Diddy Kong| AND |Fox|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Swamp')}

The Research Facility II.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Research Facility II')} AND {Check_Facility_2_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('The Research Facility II')}

Outside the Ancient Ruins.requires: ({Character_Mode('Outside the Ancient Ruins')} AND (|Captain Falcon| AND |Olimar|)) OR {Stage_Mode('Outside the Ancient Ruins')}

The Glacial Peak.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Glacial Peak')} AND (|Meta Knight| AND |Ice Climbers|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Glacial Peak')}

The Canyon.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Canyon')} AND (|Pit| AND |Mario| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Yoshi|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Canyon')}

Battleship Halberd Interior.requires: ({Character_Mode('Battleship Halberd Interior')} AND |Snake|) OR {Stage_Mode('Battleship Halberd Interior')}

Battleship Halberd Exterior.requires: ({Character_Mode('Battleship Halberd Exterior')} AND {Check_Halberd_Exterior_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('Battleship Halberd Exterior')}

Battleship Halberd Bridge.requires: ({Character_Mode('Battleship Halberd Bridge')} AND {Check_Halberd_Bridge_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('Battleship Halberd Bridge')}

The Subspace Bomb Factory I.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Subspace Bomb Factory I')} AND {Check_Bomb_Factory_Requirements()}) OR {Stage_Mode('The Subspace Bomb Factory I')}

The Subspace Bomb Factory II.requires: ({Character_Mode('The Subspace Bomb Factory II')} AND (|Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong| AND |Captain Falcon| AND |Olimar|)) OR {Stage_Mode('The Subspace Bomb Factory II')}

Entrance to Subspace.requires: ({Character_Mode('Entrance to Subspace')} AND (|Captain Falcon| AND |Donkey Kong| AND |Diddy Kong| AND |Fox| AND |Falco| AND |Ice Climbers| AND |Marth| AND |Ike| AND |Kirby| AND |Link| AND |Lucario| AND |Lucas| AND |Mario| AND |Meta Knight| AND |Mr. Game & Watch| AND |Olimar| AND |Peach| AND |@Zelda/Sheik| AND |Pikachu| AND |Pit| AND |@Red| AND |R.O.B.| AND |@Samus Aran| AND |Snake| AND |Yoshi|)) OR {Stage_Mode('Entrance to Subspace')}

Subspace I.requires: ({Character_Mode('Subspace I')} AND (|King Dedede| AND |Luigi| AND |Ness|)) OR {Stage_Mode('Subspace I')}
